headline: Garlic Bread Fantastique
description: This garlic bread recipe is a zippy change from the norm. A mixture of butter, mayonnaise, garlic, and herbs is spread on a baguette and toasted to perfection.
name: Garlic Bread Fantastique
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Set an oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source and preheat the oven's broiler.
Mix butter, mayonnaise, garlic, oregano, salt, pepper, and sage in a bowl until well combined. Spread mixture evenly on baguette halves, then sprinkle Parmesan cheese over top.
Place baguette under the preheated broiler until lightly toasted, about 5 minutes.

I recommend mixing all the ingredients except the salt, tasting it, and then adding extra salt accordingly. Do yourself a favor and make this. It's incredible.
